item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://fauna.com/ - Serverless cloud database, with native GraphQL, multi-model access and daily free tiers up to 100 MB

item.title: Adds Collect2.com
item.description: https://collect2.com - Create an API endpoint to test, automate, and connect webhooks. Free plan allows for two datasets, 2000 records, 1 forwarder, and 1 alert.

item.title: Added exceptionless
item.description: https://exceptionless.com - Real-time error, feature, log reporting and more. Free for 3k events per month/1 user. Open source and easy to self-host for unlimited use.

item.title: fixes minor typo

item.title: Added Grapedrop to Design and UI section
item.description: https://grapedrop.com/ - Responsive, powerful, SEO optimized web page builder based on GrapesJS Framework. Free for first 5 pages, unlimited custom domains, all features and simple usage.

item.title: Added GrapesJS to Design and UI section
